showerReviews.reviewText: I recently stopped at this Love’s for a 10-hour break and found the area to be generally decent. The truck stop is clean, with plenty of options for food and parking. The staff inside the store are polite and helpful; however, the shop …
Store is fairly clean, employees are fake friendly and all drinks I wanted were out.  Employee just looked at me and walked away when I asked if there was a replacement available.

Trashy place. Every drink in the fountain was out and when they were told they tell a customer he needs to get a bottle from the cooler. Not friendly at all. Bathroom smells like ammonia and the whole floor is soaked. Toilets looked like they got brushed out about a year ago

… is no overnight parking and if I don't move than Loves will tow me. As a OTR pro driver I will not shop , buy a shower or fuel at this Loves ever again. As for other drivers I hope you will boycott this establishment  till they treat all …
6pm, still plenty of parking. Store is clean, shower and bathroom were clean, food is good. Have seen the local police department patrol the lot a couple times now.
good place to stop and take a shower.friendly poeple

locations.title: Sprint Mart
locations.content: Sprint Mart may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I love Sprint Mart! This store always has amazing food Hot and ready. Bathrooms are clean and staff is good when all there. You can tell there understaffed. Lines out the door on trucker and regular customer sides. It takes 15 min or better just to stop for gas and thats on a good day. Staff is very nice just not enough of.

Always love going to this Sprint Mart. Lots of selection and always clean, organized, and nice inside. And always well lit up so you can see things good. Staff is always very friendly and helpful. Management sure knows what they’re doin! Keep it up!!
One of the nicest Sprints I've been in! Always very clean, REAL good chicken & the sweetest cashiers! The manager is also one of the most helpful & kind people!
Nice clean place, with well stocked shelves and clean restrooms

Stephanie and her staff were very friendly and provided excellent customer service. With road construction going on causing wait and traffic delays, I know that the store will be clean and service will be quick to have me on my way.

The store may be clean but the shower is not and was not. It had water bugs and shower curtains was nasty. All you have to do is throw them in the washer bc they are cloth. I will mor never shower here again

Sprint mart is great. Ours is called Dutch village... it's the closest to my house. We stop and buy lunch.  We love the island ice flavored drinks... fill up our cars... get a car wash. Just a quick stop with lots of options.
It only costs 5 bucks to have a shower. Very good
Overnight parked here took a shower, which was surprisingly only $5. Compared to Loves,  TA, etc. There's Maybe 75 spaces for parking. I'm definitely saving on my list of parking spots.

showerReviews.reviewText: … No shower …

Medium-Large paved parking lot for semi trucks.  Newly renovated showers with 3 way shower heads!  Two are handicap accessible and one aims straight down from the ceiling.  I’m 6’10” and I fit with many inches yet of clearance which pretty …

If you buy fuel the shower is free , if not fueling , shower costs you 10 bucks. The double cheeseburger and fries is good, sometimes I get the chief salad.  Everything is good in the restaurant.  Ladys working inside work hard and are nice …
Perfect place for a Shower, Clean areas, Extremely nice and polite Employees, Great food options, and Delicious food cooked Fresh, It may take a while to cook, but it is very much so worth it!
Nice renovated restrooms and shower rooms. Large, paved truck parking lot. I did not fuel or eat here so I can't comment on that. Otherwise this place is good except they close at 10

It's great to have a place out in the middle of nowhere where they have home cooked meals and cheap fuel for truckers with shower facilities ....... I'd rather have a dollar from 1000 people than $200 from 5
Good food, good prices, friendly folks, you can usually find parking, and great showers with 3 shower heads.

I just got a plate here called the Red Neck breakfast and it was just great a lot of food and didn't cost a lot 6.99 and going for a shower in the morning and that's only 10.00 and it's very quiet here a must stop
Clean, polite, good food, clean hot shower. Good old-fashioned truckstop.

Nice size lot
No shower
Gnats flying around …

Apparently new owners. Walked in to get breakfast and a coffee to go and immediately get told "restroom is only for customer." I want even going to go to your restroom. Great way to lose business. Used to be an ok truck stop... Not no more. 👎 …
Dead to the world truck stop, if you need to park/sleep, use the bathroom, and grab a drink and some chips, not bad. Beyond that it's crickets,

showerReviews.reviewText: The showers/bathrooms are ALWAYS clean that’s a good thing, but it all stops there! …

Stopped in for lunch and a shower . Hardee’s made our food fresh , the cashier (Shaniqua W) was very professional and friendly . The Love’s store itself was clean and every staff member from the time we walked through the door , greeted us …

… maintained facility with Hardee's,  and a well stocked C-Store with beer, and most anything a commuter or pro might need. Pick up the parking lot once in awhile. Scrub the soap scum off the shower walls and I'd add a star to the rating.

Soft water!!! Only reason the shower sucked here is the soft water. I asked if it was the city or if it was Loves that actually softens the water. I got blown off by the manager whenever I asked that question. But this is the second Love's …

Had to call them on the phone after waiting 20 min at the fuel desk for a shower. The hardees in the place charge me 11.00 for breakfast when the couple ahead of me ordered 2 breakfast platters and only paid 12.00 for both. I think the …
This place is dirty and disgusting.  To busy talking to friends that come in to hang out then do their job and clean. That's in shower 1. So you know if they dont clean it when you get in there.
Average Love's ❤.  Calcium on shower walls.  That's my only gripe. The staff is very nice and very professional.
Shower was uncleaned.

showerReviews.reviewText: … of towels for my husband n didn't get an attitude like at some stores. We had shower #1, and it wasn't horrible like some say, but it could use a trash can. The store itself could use a little cleaning n the employees could smile a little …

After a hard day of driving, I went to take a shower. And. They were so disgusting. There were poop stains in the toilet  and on the wall,hair on the seat,hair  in the shower. A used bar of soap and mold all in the corners and the ceiling , …
The showers need fans in them.  I felt I needed another shower after getting out. It was so hot in the shower. No fan or ac
Shower credit for this. What are yall paying these people for?

Every Loves I stop at is getting a negative review until they change their driver shower policies. One driver, should be able to buy another driver a shower if he's not using his points. Months ago I spoke to headquarters and I understand …

Went there for a shower walking around the corners to not be close to anyone, but the very rude white cashier, stop me saying out loud,  "you have to wear a mask ", I'm aware of the situation, but, why me, there was one or two costumers …
I got a shower, it's clean and thanks for customer service she is professional and kind that's why i give you 5 star.

I was waiting for a shower about 2130, till 2145 then I noticed a bent sign saying showers closed 1900-2200, the cashier was standing folding towels didn't say a thing. Please educate your employees about customer  service.

… I don't have my CDL license no more love loyalty is very wrong I have had a v.i.p card was in California needed a shower with my V.I.P card not DOT any more don't have that do have a V.I.P card with my email 4 years and Love said …

showerReviews.reviewText: … for over 30 min and not one soul asked me what I wanted.  They weren't busy at all. The girl working in the store was amazing and helpful.  She informed me aprl 1st they were starting to charge for parking but it came with a free shower.

Good food ! Very reasonable prices on their food.
Very reasonable prices on shower. Friendly staff. Plenty of staff working, so definitely NOT understaffed.
… 6$ showers …

… in. Food wasn't bad but in my opinion a bit over priced. Staff was friendly but my reason for rating 2 stars is the quality of the showers. I paid six bucks only to have a shower that look like it was fit for a prison. The water …
Came here me wife free shower with paid parking Dame good food very nice staff so full x to go to bed now 9/3/24 keep up the good work and hope see u again soon

… too bad the service was a disgrace lol.  Cashier never hung up on her personal call while serving numerous diesel transactions.  Made all of us feel like we were imposing just by walking up.   Charge for a shower with a $450 fuel purchase.

I drive a truck for a living and according to my Truck Stop book, this location was to have had showers. I'd called to get diesel fuel prices before arriving and the person on the phone was very polite and gave me the price.  When I got …

The restaurant prices have been jacked up to high. I couldn't watch the bowl game in the drivers room. I have to pay credit prices for my cash card. And I have to pay for a shower after filling up! Space way for me now on!

… busy at all.I don't think they like white people.The girl working at the back fuel desk was very rude when i paid for my shower so i decided not to get fuel.I use to tell people about this place and how good the food and service was but not …

showerReviews.reviewText: Wonderful laid-back pool with on duty lifeguards. There's a shallow end for littles, a middle part that's good for floating, and a deep end with a diving board. The facility is clean and well kept and there are bathrooms, a snack shop, a basketball hoop and tennis courts for those who want a break from the water. Great for families!

showerReviews.reviewText: The shower was clean with good pressure. Had a nice shower head. Could use a new fan & some touch-ups. Employees were nice.

One of THE nicest loves we’ve been to.  Very clean. Pleasant staff. First time ever seeing a mop being used to clean the showers. Also first time seeing a handheld shower head. Water temperature was GREAT, as was the pressure.
… The showers and bathrooms were clean. 🚽 …

Just passing through here on break. First impressions, very unfriendly here, no greeting which is fine, but unlike Loves. Shower has no pressure and wasnt very clean. Oh and the Arbys dining room WAS DISGUSTING, after seeing the state of it …
Got a hot shower and a tank full of fuel, then a little rest to hit the road again
Shower fans need some serious cleaning. Once wet the dirt can drip on you while you’re brushing your teeth. Totally unhealthy.  Please clean thanks. The showers otherwise were clean and spacious.
… Bathroom's: nasty I don't check the showers but just to see the wc.  I won't take a shower in this location. …
… But what I do know is that the shower heads here gave shower head a whole new meaning for me… …

Shower 8 electricial plug did not work. Shower 3 the electricial plug does not work and the shower flooded! I had flood the bathroom more than I'd like to just rinse off. Then could blow dry my hair.  Please fix the AC to blow cold. Thanks.

I gave it a 2 because I did take a shower and the water was hot.  The bathroom floor, the fan and the trash can were dirty.  Also the grout is starting to turn black.  They only give u 1 towel so ask for another one.

showerReviews.reviewText: … And the worst was shower experience: door had nice lock from inside. Sower walls are dirty and nasty. The toilet sit had poop all around and final point: someone just peed all over the toilet in the private shower bathroom and didn't even …

Waited 45 minutes for a shower with 1 person ahead of me. We could see the showers were empty. We both left without a shower. The taco bell ripped me off by not giving me all my food. Got the #10 and they shorted me a taco. When I left the …

I’ve been driving and showering at truck stop for awhile now….. I read and write reviews all over the country even when I feel like letting others know about some things…. This Pilot Travel Center on Interstate 55, exit 185  in Winona, MS …

Easily the filthiest shower I’ve ever had the misfortune of using.  The whole room is covered in mildew, top to bottom. The floor hasn’t been cleaned in quite a while (see photo). They don’t empty the trash between guests — but they have …

I was waiting in line for the shower, and the line didn’t move for 30 minutes. I went to check and saw that the Black janitors were just standing around talking, even though all 5 showers were waiting to be cleaned

… I got up at 4 am reserved a shower and walked in  and waited for about 5 minutes in front of the monitor only to be told that there wouldn’t be a shower available until after 8 AM.  And I could come back then.   Because John is the only …

They don't have any lock and latch at shower s door.i was taking shower.some worker open door and close it.
No privacy in showers
Be aware.
Pilot,and flying j are my favorite travel center, but shower#5 at this pilot was nasty, walls,floor, other than that nice store

The showers are dirty.  Un kept. Some places have not been wiped for months. Toilet in the showers very dirty. I wonder if they have a maintenance staff for the showers. Towels in taters.  I gues Mississippi is a poor state including the …

… everywhere. Now to talk about inside, I didn't bother checking out Taco Bell based on the reviews however the bathrooms and showers are super tiny and you can barely close the door once you walk in if you have a bookbag on. Furthermore the …
